mapper.select: SELECT A.icm_id, A.prd_id , B.prd_no , B.prd_desc , A.icm_qty , DATE_FORMAT(A.icm_order_date , '%Y-%m-%d') as icm_order_date , A.icm_price, A.icm_comment ,DATE_FORMAT(A.icm_date , '%Y-%m-%d') as icm_date , A.icm_company_name FROM prd_incoming_manage A LEFT JOIN prd_product_manage B ON A.prd_id = B.prd_id ORDER BY A.icm_date DESC;
